rComments: He is a really cool professor! Although he has a strong accent, all of his lessons are straight from the book. His sections and office hours were helpful as well, which can benefit you if you want to pass his class.

He knows what he's talking about, but it is pretty hard to understand him.  He's a god guy and helps you out as much as he can. Go to MSI! or read the book.  I went to all the MSI sections and found it to be more helpful than class. His tests are pretty funny too talking about superheroes and Disney characters.  I've seen worse teachers than him.

Yuefeng is genuinely a nice guy. I asked him to move the midterm back a day because it was the day after Halloween, and he did, no problem, saying "I hope you have time to plan a party!" (completely serious). Unfortunately his english isn't great and he speaks softly, so he's hard to understand. Lecture is completely pointless in my opinion. Easy A
